com.mygdx.game

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating levels from the .txt files and putting them in an arraylist.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(int levelNo)
      Constructor for the level class it reads the .txt file located int he assests folder for the locations of the entities, creates an arraylist for obstacles.

      This method sets the level number

      This method sets the number maximum allowed knots to given value
      void showLevel(SpiderBoi spiderBoi)
      This method scans the .txt file and puts the related objects in the given positions.

        public void showLevel(SpiderBoi spiderBoi)
        This method scans the .txt file and puts the related objects in the given positions.
        Parameters:
        spiderBoi - is the main character of the game since it will interact with the environment it is taken as a parameter.
